# pos-share

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Allows sharing a resource with other apps, people, etc.

## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                   | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ----------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `uri` _(required)_ | `uri`     | URI of the resource to share. | `string` | `undefined` |

| ---------- | ----------- |
| `"button"` |             |
